CustomField.formula: IF( aos_Last_Adoption_Date__c = TODAY() - 1, "New", IF( AND( aos_Last_Adoption_Date__c < TODAY(), aos_Last_Adoption_Date__c >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(TODAY())) ), "Recent", IF( aos_Last_Adoption_Date__c < TODAY() - 365, "Lapsed", "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Last Adoption Transaction Status
